txt.en: Wanted: Huge scales from the worms found throughout the Bruinen Source.
Wanted: Huge scales from the worms found throughout the Bruinen Source. \n\nThe dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of huge scales.
'You have done very good work. Thank you.'
'There are worms all throughout the mountains that clearly need to be purged. If you find proof of their destruction, I will see that you are rewarded.'
The dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of huge scales.
Deliver the huge scales to Larus Sharpshard at Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains
Collection boxes for this task can be found at the camps within the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Collect huge scales and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
